Articles.Content: I hate to be that guy but imgur frequently displays a certain amount of nudity and other content in its sidebars, I believe those pictures get eventually taken down but they do last a long time, Too long for comfort, I would like to suggest that while maintaining the use of imgur the forum should prohibit users from directly accessing the main page of the site, Allow embedded pictures and galleries but dont allow linking to imgur itself.

While Imgur does host adult content, such adult content is placed behind an appropriate age-wall which requires the user to state they are 18 years of age before it is displayed.

This policy makes it an excellent place to host all sorts of images without fear of sudden attacks of pornography, and I see no reason why access should be restricted here.
